bike.description: Synthesis double-butted 6061 aluminum, tapered top tube, ovalized down tube, butted chainstays, twin seat stays, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, Press Fit 30 BB shell, 34.9mm seat tube and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Road carbon fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Pro Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
American Classic Victory 30 11-Speed wheelset, 30mm rim profile, AC alloy hubs with 18/24H aerodynamic spokes
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Ultegra RD-6800 rear and Ultegra FD-6800 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST- 6800 Dual Control STI, 22-Speed
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
Shimano Ultegra BR-6800 Super SLR dual pivot calipers with Shimano Ultegra ST-6800 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly rails
